docs.snippet: There is still plenty of talk about the controversies surrounding Alex Rodriguez, but in the stands, the clubhouse, the executive suites, even the press box — everyone has an acute case of A-Rod fatigue....
docs.lead_paragraph: There is still plenty of talk about the controversies surrounding Alex Rodriguez, but in the stands, the clubhouse, the executive suites, even the press box — everyone has an acute case of A-Rod fatigue.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column contends that New York Yankees players, management and fans have grown tired of discussing Alex Rodriguez and the controversies he has spawned over past 10 years; laments that Rodriguez will nonetheless remain in spotlight, due to his outsized fame, for rest of season.

headline.main: The Dog Days of a Summer Circus
headline.print_headline: The Dog Days of a Summer Circus

docs.snippet: On “The Tonight Show,” Mark Cuban called Major League Baseball’s stance toward Alex Rodriguez “disgraceful.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: On “The Tonight Show,” Mark Cuban called Major League Baseball’s stance toward Alex Rodriguez “disgraceful.”
docs.abstract: Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban criticizes Major League Baseball's 211-game suspension of New York Yankees star Alex Rodriguez, saying it is unduly harsh.

docs.abstract: New York Mets top catching prospect Travis d'Arnaud will move up to the majors to fill in for John Buck when his third child is born.
